resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103706</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103706</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202737</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Life of Twain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Lebensdauer von Twain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie de Twain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vida de Twain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La durata di Twain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ζωή Twain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vida de Twain</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This assignment allows students to explore the life of Mark Twain by using concept map graphic organizers to compile their research in an interesting and creative way. This is a great way to assess students' comprehension!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Anweisung erlaubt Kursteilnehmern, die 
Lebensdauer der Markierung Twain zu erforschen, indem sie Konzeptkarte
graphische Organisatoren verwendet, um ihre Forschung in einer 
interessanten und kreativen Methode zu kompilieren. Dieses ist 
eine große Methode, Erfassen der Kursteilnehmer festzusetzen!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette affectation permet à des étudiants 
d'explorer la vie de la marque Twain en utilisant les organisateurs 
graphiques de carte de concept pour compiler leur recherche d'une voie
intéressante et créatrice. C'est une grande voie d'évaluer la
compréhension des étudiants !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atribuição permite que os estudantes 
explorem a vida da marca Twain usando organizers gráficos do mapa do 
conceito compilar sua pesquisa em uma maneira interessante e creativa.
Esta é uma maneira grande avaliar a compreensão dos 
estudantes!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa assegnazione permette che gli allievi 
esplorino la durata del contrassegno Twain usando gli organizzatori 
grafici del programma di concetto per compilare la loro ricerca in un 
modo interessante e creativo. Ciò è un modo grande valutare la
comprensione degli allievi!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ανάθεση επιτρέπει στους σπουδαστές για να 
ερευνήσει τη ζωή Mark Twain με τη χρησιμοποίηση των γραφικών
διοργανωτών χαρτών έννοιας για να μεταγλωττίσει την έρευνά τους 
με έναν ενδιαφέροντα και δημιουργικό τρόπο. Αυτό είναι 
ένας μεγάλος τρόπος να αξιολογηθεί η κατανόηση των σπουδαστών!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta asignación permite que los estudiantes 
exploren la vida de la marca Twain usando a organizadores gráficos de
la correspondencia del concepto para compilar su investigación de una
manera interesante y creativa. ¡Esto es una gran manera de 
evaluar la comprensión de los estudiantes!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PAM STONESIFER
FN:PAM STONESIFER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202737</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103706</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-life-of-twain</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
